response.overview: Ojo de Mujer is a documentary that features four Nicaraguan women filmmakers, whose perspectives and testimonies allow us to learn about their beginnings, some of their most representative works, and how, through their craft, they have contributed to building a collective memory within their communities leaving lasting roots for future generations of filmmakers in the country.
response.tagline: The female gaze that shapes Nicaraguan cinema.
response.title: Ojo de Mujer
